meanings.definition: To defeat in a wrestling match.
meanings.sent1: He managed to outwrestle his opponent and win the match.
meanings.sent2: She trained hard to outwrestle her rival in the upcoming tournament.
meanings.sent3: The underdog surprised everyone by outwrestling the champion.
meanings.sent4: In the final round, he outwrestled his fears and emerged victorious.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler's determination to outwrestle all odds inspired the crowd.

meanings.definition: To outmaneuver or outsmart in a physical contest.
meanings.sent1: Using his agility, he was able to outwrestle his opponent in the race.
meanings.sent2: She tried to outwrestle her friends in a game of tag.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel managed to outwrestle the birds for the last acorn.
meanings.sent4: She outwrestled her fear of heights and climbed to the top of the tree.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to outwrestle the suspect's alibi to solve the case.
